alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 5:45PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... ...REPLACES WINTER STORM WARNING PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Blowing Snow and snow. Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph, strongest on exposed ridgelines and open areas. Additional snow accumulations under one inch. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Wayne, Lackawanna, Luzerne, and Pike Counties. In New York, Sullivan County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create icy spots on previously plowed roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Steady snow has ended, though a few stray lake effect snow showers may work into the area this evening. Strong winds and blowing snow are the main hazard going forward. Wind chills will also drop between 0 and -10 degrees at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, and for Pennsylvania at 511pa.com. Or, dial 5-1-1 from with the respective state.

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne
